mapper.insert:
CREATE TABLE `#{request.tableName}`( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
`#{field.columnName}` #{field.type}(#{field.length}) not null COMMENT '#{field.comment}',
`create_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `create_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人', `update_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间', `update_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人', `remarks` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注', `del_flag` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '删除标记',
`parent_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '父节点ID', `parent_ids` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '父节点联集', `level` bigint(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '层级深度', `sort` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '排序', `create_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `create_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人', `update_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间', `update_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人', `remarks` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注', `del_flag` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '删除标记',
PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT= '#{request.comment}';
mapper.select:
SELECT t.COLUMN_NAME AS columnName, upper(t.DATA_TYPE) AS type, t.COLUMN_COMMENT AS comment, IF(t.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO', true, false) AS isNullable, t.ORDINAL_POSITION AS ordinalPosition, t.COLUMN_KEY AS columnKey, t.EXTRA AS extra, CASE WHEN t.DATA_TYPE IN ('text', 'tinytext', 'mediumtext', 'longtext', 'json', 'blob', 'mediumblob', 'longblob') THEN 0 WHEN t.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH IS NOT NULL THEN t.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH WHEN t.NUMERIC_PRECISION IS NOT NULL THEN t.NUMERIC_PRECISION ELSE 0 END as length FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS t WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{request.schemaName} AND t.TABLE_NAME = #{request.tableName}
t.COLUMN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.columnName},'%')
AND t.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('id','create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')
AND t.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('id','parent_id','parent_ids','level','sort','create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')
AND t.COLUMN_NAME != 'id'
